alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 12:00PM PST until January 13 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of light freezing rain expected. Ice accumulations of 0.01 to 0.05 inches possible near the Douglas County and Lane County border. * WHERE...Northwest Douglas County, including the cities of Curtain, Drain, Yoncalla, Elkton, Scottsburg, and Reedsport. Affected roadways include portions of I-5 and Highway 38. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Freezing rain can quickly make solid surfaces slick and dangerous to travel across. Freezing rain can also weigh down branches and power lines, resulting in property damage or interruptions to power availability. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; South Central Oregon Coast
